data.title: Harvey Keitel
meta_keywords: Roles turned down by Harvey Keitel
data.meta_description: See which roles Harvey Keitel turned down.
data.text:
Roles turned down by Harvey Keitel:

Harvey Keitel was actually cast as Willard but was fired 2 weeks into production.

Actor who got the part: Martin Sheen

Keitel auditioned for the part of Curly, but did not get it.

Actor who got the part: Jack Palance

Harvey Keitel actually filmed some scenes as Victor Ziegler before he left the project.

Actor who got the part: Sydney Pollack

Martin Scorsese wanted Keitel to play Travis Bickle.

Actor who got the part: Robert DeNiro

Did you know that Harvey Keitel was not the only choice for these movies? (click to learn more)
